user.title: Solar Forecast ML
user.description:
⚡ Configure your smart solar forecast.

💡 Tip: Specify the size of your plant in kWp to improve the initial forecasts.

data.plant_kwp: 🏭 Size of the solar plant in kWp (optional)

data_description.weather_entity: Recommendation: A weather service with precise local forecasts.
data_description.power_entity: This sensor must reset to 0 daily (e.g., sensor.solar_daily_yield).
data_description.plant_kwp: Example: 10.5. Used for better initial forecasts; the system will learn automatically afterward.
data_description.update_interval: How often sensor data should be collected. The actual forecast is only created once a day in the morning.
